meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>flower</kanji> <kanji>willow</kanji> for some reason is a <vocabulary>red light district</vocabulary>. Just imagine a shady red light district, and right in the middle is a flowering willow.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
